Title: [L01] Missing error messages
Content:
**Update:** *Fixed in [pull request #53](https://github.com/endaoment/endaoment-contracts/pull/53).*


There are several require statements in the `Fund` and `EndaomentAdmin` contracts without error messages. In particular:


* In [line 188](https://github.com/endaoment/endaoment-contracts/blob/f60aa253d3d869ad6460877f23e6092acb313add/contracts/EndaomentAdmin.sol#L188) of the `EndaomentAdmin` contract.
* In [line 43](https://github.com/endaoment/endaoment-contracts/blob/f60aa253d3d869ad6460877f23e6092acb313add/contracts/Fund.sol#L43), [52](https://github.com/endaoment/endaoment-contracts/blob/f60aa253d3d869ad6460877f23e6092acb313add/contracts/Fund.sol#L52),[101](https://github.com/endaoment/endaoment-contracts/blob/f60aa253d3d869ad6460877f23e6092acb313add/contracts/Fund.sol#L101) and [123](https://github.com/endaoment/endaoment-contracts/blob/f60aa253d3d869ad6460877f23e6092acb313add/contracts/Fund.sol#L123) of the `Fund` contract.


Consider including specific and informative error messages in all require statements.
